=== reshepe web vitals ===

Contributors: reshepe

Tags: core web vitals, performance monitoring, monitoring web vitals, website speed insights, web vitals

Requires at least: 5.0

Tested up to: 6.6

Requires PHP: 8.2

Stable tag: 0.0.35

License: GPLv3

License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html

monitor core web vitals on your website

== Description ==

reshepe web vitals is a plugin that monitors real user experience and web vitals data

- monitor real user experience (RUM) and web vitals data
- simple yet powerful real user experience (RUM) and core web vitals data monitoring
- all data is sent to your dashboard
- browse through all information in real-time
- no tracking
- no cookies

### @reshepe-web-vitals/wordpress

reshepe web vitals

monitor core web vitals on your website

[reshepe.dev](https://reshepe.dev)

looking for different web vitals package?

| platform   | link                                                                                 | documentation                                                   |
|:-----------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------|
| javascript | [@reshepe-web-vitals/js](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@reshepe-web-vitals/js)       | [documentation](https://docs.reshepe.dev/web-vitals/javascript) |
| vue        | [@reshepe-web-vitals/vue](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@reshepe-web-vitals/vue)     | [documentation](https://docs.reshepe.dev/web-vitals/vue)        |
| react      | [@reshepe-web-vitals/react](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@reshepe-web-vitals/react) | [documentation](https://docs.reshepe.dev/web-vitals/react)      |
| nuxt       | [@reshepe-web-vitals/nuxt](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@reshepe-web-vitals/nuxt)   | [documentation](https://docs.reshepe.dev/web-vitals/nuxt)       |
| next       | [@reshepe-web-vitals/next](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@reshepe-web-vitals/next)   | [documentation](https://docs.reshepe.dev/web-vitals/next)       |
| wordpress  | [@reshepe-web-vitals/wordpress](https://wordpress.org/plugins/reshepe-web-vitals)    | [documentation](https://docs.reshepe.dev/web-vitals/wordpress)  |
